EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: GoDirect Connectivity Conference in Zurich, Switzerland
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the GoDirect Connectivity Conference in Zurich, Switzerland. Please save this email for future reference.
Event: GoDirect Connectivity Conference Date: Tuesday, December 4, 2018 Time: 09:00 - 17:00 Location: HILTON ZURICH AIRPORT Address: Hohenbuehlstrasse 10, CH-8152 Opfikon, Switzerland
We look forward to meeting you at the event.
Sincerely, Honeywell GoDirect Team godirect@honeywell.com <[[mailto:godirect@honeywell.com]]>
